questionBank.theme: be able to see 10 minutes into your own future or 10 minutes into the future of anyone but yourself
be famous when you are alive and forgotten when you die or unknown when you are alive but famous after you die
go to jail for 4 years for something you didn’t do or get away with something horrible you did but always live in fear of being caught
accidentally be responsible for the death of a child or accidentally be responsible for the deaths of three adults
the general public think you are a horrible person but your family be very proud of you or your family think you are a horrible person but the general public be very proud of you
wear monokini forever or never visit a beach again
end death due to car accidents or end terrorism
leave your unemployed son homeless or pay for his drug habits and illegal activities
end the life a single human being or 100 cute baby animals
read minds or accurately predict future
visit 100 years in the past or 100 years in the future
have an average SO with a great personality or a hot SO with a boring personality
lose all of your old memories or never be able to make new ones
your child be less attractive and extremely intelligent or extremely attractive and less intelligent
be 10% smarter or 10% better looking
have more friends or be closer to the ones you have
have everyone love you but hate yourself or have everyone hate you but love yourself
be trapped on a rope bridge over a canyon or in a dark cramped cage
go shirtless or pantless for the rest of your life
get explosive diarrhea every time you meet your boss or every time you meet your SO’s parents
peel all your nails out of your fingers or pull all the teeth out of your mouth
die saving 10,000 strangers from death knowing no one would ever know it was you or live knowing everyone would know you decided not to save 10,000 people’s lives
freeze to death or burn to death
have no fingers or no eyes
have uncontrollable gas at work for the rest of your life or uncontrollable gas on every first date for the rest of your life
be filthy rich but have to be Justin Bieber’s assistant or dirt poor but get to be anyone’s assistant you choose
everyone thinks your life sucks but it’s actually awesome or everyone thinks your life is great but it’s actually shitty
have a time machine that only goes back in time or a time machine that only goes forward in time

have an animal best friend that could be any animal you choose and it would be intelligent and speak to you (and you could ride it around town if it is a large animal like a bear) or be married to someone with a hot body
have the superpower to fly or to become invisible
have unlimited love or unlimited money
have everything you’ve ever wanted but you die in one year or live your life as it is now
cut off one of your fingers or pay $5,000 of your own money for the person you hate most to go on a spa vacation
have your SO look through all your text/chat/email history or your employer
never have internet access again or never be able to take an airplane again
be an average, not famous professional athlete on your current salary or a wealthy, world renowned professional in a field you don’t care about (mathematician, classical musician, whatever)
be the famous author of Twilight or the famous writer of every Nickelback song
be in a real version of The Walking Dead or Jurassic Park
have 20 kids over the course of your life or never be able to have or adopt children
be the designated driver and stay sober for a night or walk ten miles home with your whole group of friends
drink too much and embarrass yourself in front of your grandmother or in front of your crush
get a huge tattoo of your partner’s name across your chest or a tiny tattoo of their face on your arm
be immune to hangovers forever, or never have to go to the dentist ever again
be able to eat everything you ever wanted and have an amazing body, or buy everything you’ve ever wanted and never run out of money
have to stand up in the middle of every wedding ceremony you attend and scream “It should have been me!” or take the microphone during somebody’s reception speech and cry about how alone you are
be able to speak to animals or be able to read other people’s minds
have all water taste like vodka or all food taste like old feet [without their actual essences changing]
look 90 starting right now but live until you’re 90, or look 21 starting right now but only live for another 10 years
never wash your sheets ever again or only be able to shower once every two weeks
snort obnoxiously every time you laughed or have a voice that sounded exactly like Janice from Friends
appear unbelievably attractive to your partner and extremely unattractive to everyone else, or unbelievably attractive to everyone else but extremely unattractive to your partner
be plain-looking but always the funniest person in the room, or super hot but always the most boring person in the room
have to wear the same outfit every day for the rest of your existence or have every single piece of clothing you own have a massive brown stain on it
show up to work one day with no pants, or pee yourself in the middle of a presentation in front of all your coworkers
have to sneak the word ‘moist’ into every conversation you have, or have a piece of pepper permanently stuck in your front teeth
have your feet look like a second pair of hands or your hands look like a second pair of feet
be cheated on or be the person known to everyone else as a cheater
be super intelligent but a huge asshole, or insanely kind but also incredibly stupid
have to lick people’s face whenever they go to shake your hand or scream “I didn’t wash my hands!” to all of your coworkers every time you come back from the bathroom
have all of your google searches, or all of your text messages, be broadcasted to everyone on Facebook
be known as someone who always crop-dusts or someone who never offers to pay the bill
be with someone who occasionally tells big lies, or someone who is brutally honest all of the time
be well-liked and wrong, or not liked and always right
have your dream career and never fall in love, or fall madly in love and work a 9-5 that you don’t really enjoy
have your significant other read your entire journal with extremely personal thoughts and secrets, or have thousands of people you don’t know read just three pages of it
know how you’re going to die or when you’re going to die
have 50 ‘good’ friends or 3 super-close best friends
change your appearance, or your personality (if you could adapt it in every way you want)
have one last day to live with the ability to say goodbye to everyone and not do much else, or do everything you’ve ever wanted but not have time to say goodbye to anyone
be able to know when your significant other is lying or hear all of their thoughts
be with someone whose favorite quality about you is physical, or someone whose favorite quality about you is non-physical
be healthy but look terrible, or be unhealthy and look great
receive a handwritten love letter that’s really corny and kind of makes you cringe (in a cute way), or an excellently crafted, heart-felt text message that makes you swoon
find your soul mate or have your dream job
be cheated on (numerous times) and never know, or cheat on someone else and have to tell them
hear the voices of dead people or see their ghosts
cut off your own arm or gouge out your own eye
be convicted of a crime you didn’t commit or kill someone and get away with it
be stuck on an island with a killer or stuck in the ocean with hungry sharks
be blind or see spirits everywhere you go
eat a dead rat or live spiders
Have every first bite of pizza you have be really hot, burning your tongue, or never having pizza again
have a magic van that can teleport you anywhere you want and time travel, or have a magic ring that when it touches a book you absorb all the knowledge inside
be able to talk with animals, or be fluent in every language
Cheetos cheese on your fingers for the rest of your life or have your breath smell like garlic
lose both arms or both legs
live in the same city the rest of your life, or move to a new city every year for the rest of your life
be blind or deaf
have a hundred kids or have a hundred siblings
give up bathing for a month or internet for a month
be a one hit wonder or have a sustained music career of mediocrity
get bit by a shark or a lion
sleep in a bed of spiders or snakes
never need to pee again or speak all languages in the world
have fingers as long as your arms, or arms as long as your fingers
have the ability to transfer emotions and receive them from people or be able transfer physical sensations and receive them from people
not be able to tell the difference between a muffin and a baby, or change your gender every time you sneeze
have to wear your shoes on the opposite feet for life or only have three fingers on each hand
control fire or water
date a super attractive girl/guy who had herpes OR an unattractive significant other who had no teeth and can NEVER put in dentures, strictly straight gums
jump off the highest building in the world with a parachute, or play one turn of Russian roulette
lose all your hair or lose all your teeth
have $10,000 transfered to your bank account daily, or eat both of your hands
there be a ding sound every time you wink or have a cartoonish gun sound go off when you make a finger gun
have the power to control the weather within a 1 mile radius of where you are at any moment, or clap your hands and 3 hot, fresh tacos made to your taste appear on a plate before you
be forced to say 'M'lady' every time you address a woman, or yell 'I'm an Atheist!' as loud as possible every time someone says 'God Bless You.'
have to listen to your least favorite music for the rest of your life or have to say the 'YOOUUUUUUUU!' from Crank that by Soulja boy every time you say the word 'you'
get paid $500 every time you make someone laugh or $10,000 every time you make some one cry
gain the knowledge of any book by touch or gain the skills of any person by touch
be able to instantly cook any food to perfection, or be able to change what food is the moment it hits your stomach
be able to Copy/Paste in real life, or Undo
get a swastika tattoo on your chest the size of your head and 500k worth of bitcoin or a tattoo on your neck that says YOLO and a lifetime supply of mangos
not ever be able to leave your house without carying a DVD copy of 'paul blart mall cop' or you permanently lose your sense of smell
have $500,000,000,000,000 or 10 wishes but you cant wish for money
rewind time for 60 minutes a day, or freeze time for 60 minutes a day
try to high-five every single person who walks past you for the rest of your life, or start singing 'YMCA' every time you get anxious
die at age 40 or age 4000

have a 3 month relationship with Taylor Swift but afterwards she writes an extremely unflattering breakup song about you that is a smash hit and dominates the top charts for years, or not do that and continue living your normal life
be able see 30 minutes into the future or be able to change what happened 5 minutes in the past
sweat broccoli and cheddar soup or every movie you watch slowly become Shrek halfway through
everyone believes everything you say 100% of the time or everyone believes 100% of the jokes you tell are absolutely hilarious
have your name legally changed to Adolf Hitler or eat nothing but cherry jello for the rest of your life
every single bug that you've ever killed come back, all at once, for revenge, or a report of every thing you've ever masturbated to delivered to your friends and family
always feel like there is a small rock in your shoe, or always have chip crumbs in your bed
sweat out mayonnaise, or only be allowed to eat mayonnaise
have to pay for everything in pennies, or have to use a pogo stick as your only means of transportation
play every instrument beautifully, or speak every language fluently
spend 10 years in jail or 15 years in a coma
give your parents unrestricted access to your browsing history, or your boss
be able to read minds or able to see into the future
have a cat with a human face, or a dog with human hands instead of paws
win $50,000 or let your best friend win $500,000
give up your favorite food forever, or wake up every single day with a 12% chance that you are completely covered in peanut butter
have to snort all of your nutrition through your nose or live in a house made of human bones
be drowned in a deep fryer, or go feet first through a wood chipper
constantly be kept upright like a weeble wobble or have play doh come out of all of your orifices when you are squeezed
receive $5 right now or have your local WNBA team win a championship
have a receding hairline or a proceeding hair line
be invisible, or be able to shape shift (look like any person, at any time)
only teleport to places you've been or only teleport to places you've never been
have the hiccups for the rest of your life or feel like you have to sneeze and not be able to for the rest of your life
be eaten by a great white shark or beaten to death by a silver back gorilla
have ham hands or hands made of unlimited lotion
be two clouds or the number six
lose your short term memory or your long term memory
run full speed everywhere you go or everything you say is yelled at full volume
have a dog sized giraffe, or a giraffe sized dog
live in a zombie Apocalypse or a robot Apocalypse
bleed from your ears everytime you said the letter 'r', or have 3 fingers on each hand and they are random everyday
have eternal brain freeze or eternal sunburn all over your body
have a beard made of cotton candy, or hair made of spaghetti
